headline: Circle stock soars on stablecoin bill passage, adds to 500% rally: 'History is being made'
summary: Circle stock rallied nearly 20% on the Senate's passage of a stablecoin regulation bill, a move that is considered to be a major win for the crypto industry.

headline: Robinhood Stock Sees $2 Million Insider Buy
summary: New director Christopher Payne just bought 26,500 Robinhood shares. He joined the trading-platform’s board in December.

headline: Deutsche Bank and BofA Initiate Coverage on eToro (NASDAQ:ETOR), Remain Neutral
summary: eToro Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ETOR) is one of the 10 stocks that Jim Cramer and analysts are watching. On June 9, Deutsche Bank and BofA initiated coverage on the company stock with a $70 and $71 price target, respectively. headline: Meta, social media, stablecoin-related stocks: Trending Tickers
summary: Meta (META) is offering $100 million bonuses to OpenAI (OPAI.PVT) developers as the tech giant builds out its artificial intelligence (AI) team. Social media stocks, like Meta, Snap (SNAP), and Pinterest (PINS), are in focus after the White House confirmed that President Trump will sign an executive order this week to extend the TikTok delay, allowing the ByteDance-owned platform to avoid a US ban. The Senate passed the GENIUS stablecoin bill, sending stablecoin-related stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), and Circle (CRCL) higher. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From Robinhood’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Robinhood’s first quarter saw revenue growth ahead of Wall Street’s expectations, but the market responded negatively to the results. Management attributed the performance to robust product expansion, including the launch of futures and prediction markets, as well as continued momentum in options trading. headline: Up Over 200% in the Past Year, Is It Too Late to Invest in Robinhood Stock?
summary: Robinhood generated 50% revenue growth last quarter as it has been producing some impressive results in recent periods.  One of the hottest stocks with retail investors in the past year has been Robinhood Markets (NASDAQ: HOOD).  It's hard to argue with the returns Robinhood has been generating in the past year when you consider just how impressive its performance has looked.
